title: Stranger at the Gates
description: Beautiful, sophisticated, American-born Comtesse Louise de Bernard thought she had left the passions and terrors of the past far behind her. Then one day, she was caught once more in the web of evil and violence that spread from London, to Paris, to Berlin, to an isolated French chateau - and the nightmare legacy of the past came alive and would not let her escape...
author: Evelyn Anthony
